"Well, it wasn't so much the physical damage as what happened up 
here."  Jackie taps his lupine companion's cranial module.  "I had to 
rewire a few connections in your logic center."  He decides against 
telling him about the berserker incident for now.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang was startled. He didn't even open the mouth.
> 
> Blackfang: Hey! That wasn't me! It was Kenzo's idea I think!
> 
> He got up from the operation table and took grab of it a moment so 
he 
> could recalibrate his balance.
> 
> Blackfang: Hey Wheeljack, since I don't remember anything since the 
> battle with the preds, was I that bad?
